WorkItem.Description:
bool matrix for TriStateMatrix is a bit of short usage. As matrix split to stencil, format information, version information and data. Mask only apply to format information and data. Thus if we use bool for status, then we have to apply mask while build up matrix like ZXing's approach.

 

Goal: Change bool status to enum status.

Label stencil and version information as NoMask status, "Format" for format information and "Data" for data.

Build up matrix sequence will be: stencil => format and version information => data apply to "None" status cell => mask apply to "Format" or "data" cell.
WorkItem.Summary: Change TriStateMatrix's status bool matrix to enum matrix
